Plot

On the morning of May 10, 1996, climbers (Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin) from two expeditions start their final 
ascent toward the summit of Mount Everest, the highest point on Earth. With little warning, 
a violent storm strikes the mountain, engulfing the adventurers in one of the fiercest blizzards ever encountered by man. 
Challenged by the harshest conditions imaginable, the teams must endure blistering winds and freezing temperatures 
in an epic battle to survive against nearly impossible odds.
